[00:13.16]I'm driving home for Christmas
[00:17.59]Oh, I can't wait to see those faces
[00:23.55]I'm driving home for Christmas,yeah
[00:28.45]Well I'm moving down that line
[00:34.00]And it's been so long
[00:37.92]But I will be there
[00:40.23]I sing this song
[00:43.07]To pass the time away
[00:46.25]Driving in my car
[00:51.75]Driving in my car
[01:19.12]It's gonna take some time
[01:21.20]But I'll get there
[01:24.72]Top to toe in tailbacks
[01:29.04]Oh, I got red lights on the run
[01:35.23]But soon there'll be a freeway
[01:40.14]To get my feet on holy ground
[01:45.62]So I sing for you
[01:49.73]Though you can't hear me
[01:52.11]When I get through

[01:58.37]Driving in my car
